concept.description: Markiert Klassen, die das Interface "de.bund.bva.pliscommon.batchrahmen.batch.rahmen.BatchAusfuehrungsBean" implementieren, mit "Batch:AusfuehrungsBean".
concept.cypher: MATCH (batchBean:ApplicationType) WHERE (batchBean)-[:IMPLEMENTS|EXTENDS*]->(:Type {fqn: "de.bund.bva.pliscommon.batchrahmen.batch.rahmen.BatchAusfuehrungsBean"}) AND NOT EXISTS(batchBean.abstract) SET batchBean:Batch:AusfuehrungsBean RETURN count(batchBean)

constraint.description: Eine Ausf√ºhrungsbean darf keine Transaktionen starten oder beenden.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (batchBean:AusfuehrungsBean)-[:DECLARES]->(methode:Method), ()-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotationType:Type) WHERE ((batchBean)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotationType) OR (methode)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotationType)) AND annotationType.fqn = "org.springframework.transaction.annotation.Transactional" RETURN DISTINCT batchBean.name AS BatchAusfuehrungsBeanMitTransactional

constraint.description: Batchklassen werden mit dem Suffix "Batch" gekennzeichnet.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (batchBean:Batch:AusfuehrungsBean) WHERE NOT batchBean.name ENDS WITH "Batch" RETURN batchBean.name AS BatchOhneBatchSuffix
